original: Saddhindriyassa pañca vivekā, pañca virāgā, pañca nirodhā, pañca vosaggā, dvādasa nissayā.
analyzed: saddhindriyassa pañca vivekā pañca virāgā pañca nirodhā pañca vosaggā dvādasa nissayā

original: paññindriyassa pañca vivekā, pañca virāgā, pañca nirodhā, pañca vosaggā, dvādasa nissayā.

vikkhambhana viveko tad aṅga viveko samuccheda viveko paṭippassaddhi viveko nissaraṇa viveko

original: Vikkhambhanaviveko ca nīvaraṇānaṁ paṭhamajjhānaṁ bhāvayato, tadaṅgaviveko ca diṭṭhigatānaṁ
analyzed: vikkhambhana viveko ca nīvaraṇānam paṭhama jhānam bhāvayato tad aṅga viveko ca diṭṭhi gatāna

original: nibbedhabhāgiyaṁ samādhiṁ bhāvayato, samucchedaviveko ca lokuttaraṁ khayagāmimaggaṁ
analyzed: nibbedha bhāgiyam samādhim bhāvayato samuccheda viveko ca lokuttaram khaya gāmi magga

original: bhāvayato, paṭippassaddhiviveko ca phalakkhaṇe, nissaraṇaviveko ca nirodho nibbānaṁ.
analyzed: bhāvayato paṭippassaddhi viveko ca phala kkhaṇe nissaraṇa viveko ca nirodho nibbāna
ime pañca vivekā
